# HoneyMarron

> HoneyMarron is an independent app developer creating free, creative iOS applications.

## About

HoneyMarron develops and publishes free iPhone apps focused on creativity and accessibility. Our apps are available on the App Store and are designed to be simple, useful, and beautiful.

## Apps

### Award Certificate Creator
- Create beautiful award certificates on iPhone
- 5 templates (gold, rainbow, floral, graduation, birthday)
- Auto-save drafts and history management
- Vertical and horizontal layout support
- Multi-language support (Japanese/English)
- High-quality PNG export
- Free to use
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6748368413
- Official Site: https://awardcert.honeymarron.com/

### VoicyCare
- Music player that boosts volume up to 200%
- 5-band equalizer
- Volume presets and AB repeat
- Dropbox cloud integration
- Large fonts and buttons for accessibility
- Ideal for people with hearing difficulties
- Free to use
- App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id6749561636
- Official Site: https://voicy-care.honeymarron.com/

## Links
